query:
select
                t.id,
                t.route_id,
                t.direction,
                t.assigned,
                t.created_at,
                array_agg(jsonb_build_object('stop_id',
                st.stop_id,
                'arrival',
                st.arrival,
                'departure',
                st.departure)
            order by
                st.arrival) as stop_times
            from
                trips t
            left join stop_times st on
                t.id = st.trip_id
            where
                t.id = any(
                select
                    t.id
                from
                    trips t
                left join stop_times st on
                    st.trip_id = t.id
                where
                    st.arrival > now())
            group by
                t.id
